text: On 27 November 2024, I started Cognitive Web Works. A front-end of my own freelance business. A freelance initiative, you may say.

The web evolved a lot in the past decades and technology became more and more advanced. Desires and wants switched too. In an era of changes and upgrades, I wanted to bring my contribution in making the web smarter. In the little time outside my job, I wish to contribute to the progress and learn more too. A cognitive web awaits! Thus, Cognitive Web Works began. I entered the founder mode. In summary, it is a hands-on, resourceful approach adopted by founders, during the early stages of a startup or project, characterized by rapid iteration, multitasking, and adaptability.

items: Resourcefulness: Making the most out of limited tools and budgets.
Persistence: Overcoming obstacles and staying motivated through uncertainty.
Empathy: Understanding customer needs deeply and tailoring solutions accordingly.
Resilience: Bouncing back quickly from setbacks and learning from mistakes.

text: I discovered that the founder mode is essential for driving early-stage growth, innovation, and adaptability, but at the same time it must evolve as a project scales. I heard that successfully transitioning from founder mode to structured growth is critical to long-term success. #FingersCrossed
